name: Hamago
description:
Meet Hamago, the little hamster up there in the game!
Please suggest a feature in the comments below. Let's build a game together :3

What is this game "Hamago"?

Right now, it is a blank canvas and endless possibilities. Suggest a feature and I will pick one at a time and add it to the game. What it will become is up to you!

Hey why?

Could be fun

This will not make a good game...

That's okay! The destination is the journey. Let's make some hot garbage

How do I suggest a feature?
  •  The smaller the better! Smaller suggestions means faster dev
  • Could be one word like "gravity" or "hamster" and I'll figure something out
  • Or could be very specific like "when the player presses the left arrow key, Hamago moves to the left" or "put a door on the top platform"
  • Please remember to be kind
  • Search deep in your heart what experience you would like to impart upon our dear, dear friend Hamago
  • Now you're ready! Into the comments you go
    • Yes, even you
